4.name: Sol
4.text:
"Ooooo... So this is Luclea Village... There are
so many people other than Sensei... Amazing..."

5.name: Sol
5.text:
"It's so lively and nice here... It feels really
refreshing!"

7.name: Sol
7.text:
"A fountain!!!! A watermill!!!! A carriage!!!!
Ohhhhhhh... signs of civilization..."

12.name: Narration
12.text:
As Sol walked through the village streets, the
villagers all turned back in surprise. A beautiful
girl with a golden dragon's tail, and moreover,
half-naked like the mermaid princess in a
minstrel's tale - it was impossible not to stand
out.

13.name: Narration
13.text:
And so, the passing red-haired adventurer also
vividly remembered her figure.

17.name: Eric
17.text:
"Ah! You're the golden dragon's child who helped
me back then!! I've been looking for you!"

23.name: Eric
23.text:
"I see, I see. I've heard the rumors... So you're
the golden dragon raised by Eni-sensei."

24.name: Eric
24.text:
"I never got to thank you back then. I'm really
grateful for what you did. I'm Eric, an adventurer
active around here."

26.name: Eric
26.text:
"Alright, it's not really about repaying a debt,
but since we've crossed paths, I'll accompany you,
Sol!"

28.name: Eric
28.text:
"Eni-sensei also asked me to help you if I saw
Sol! I'll guide you to the tavern where
adventurers gather!"

29.name: Eric
29.text:
"It's called the 'Headless Beauty' Inn, and that's
where we hang out. If you're looking for
companions, that's probably the best place to
start."

30.name: Sol
30.text:
"Wow, that's really impressive! ...How can you
tell she's a beauty even without a head?"
